glossary.name: Clicks
glossary.description: Number of clicks on Adjust links from your campaigns

glossary.name: Clicks (Attribution)
glossary.description: Number of times someone clicked on the creative

glossary.name: Impressions
glossary.description: Total number of ad impressions reported for your campaign

glossary.name: Impressions (Attribution)
glossary.description: Number of times the creatives were displayed

glossary.name: Installs
glossary.description: Total number of installs that have occurred

glossary.name: Organic install rate
glossary.description: Ratio of organic installs of the whole traffic.

glossary.name: Reinstalls
glossary.description: Number of reinstalls that occurred

glossary.name: Impression Cost
glossary.description: The cost of impressions

glossary.name: Impressions (paid)
glossary.description: The number of impressions for which there is ad spend data

glossary.name: Installs (paid)
glossary.description: The number of installs for which there is cost data

glossary.name: CTR
glossary.description: The average number of impressions per click

glossary.name: Uninstalls
glossary.description: Number of users who uninstalled the app during a selected date range

glossary.name: Uninstall (Cohort)
glossary.description: Number of uninstalls by users who installed your app during the selected cohort period

glossary.name: Reattributions
glossary.description: Number of reattributions that have occurred

glossary.name: Reattribution Reinstalls
glossary.description: Number of reinstalls that resulted in a reattribution

glossary.name: Deattributions
glossary.description: Total number of deattributions that took place

glossary.name: Sessions
glossary.description: Total number of sessions, including installs, reinstalls, reattributions, and reattribution reinstalls

glossary.name: Total Events
glossary.description: The total number of any triggered events

glossary.name: Revenue events
glossary.description: Number of revenue events triggered by users who installed the app in a selected date range and had the app installed for a selected cohort period

glossary.name: In-app revenue
glossary.description: Amount of in-app revenue, based on revenue events reported by the Adjust SDK or recorded via server-to-server tracking

glossary.name: Revenue (Cohort)
glossary.description: Revenue your app generated from users who installed your app within the time period you selected

glossary.name: Avg. DAUs
glossary.description: Average number of daily active users (DAU) for the time period you selected

glossary.name: Avg. WAUs
glossary.description: Average number of unique weekly active users (WAU) for the selected period

glossary.name: Avg. MAUs
glossary.description: Average number of unique monthly active users (MAU) for your selected timeframe

glossary.name: Avg. DAUs
glossary.description: Average number of daily active users (DAU) for the time period you selected

glossary.name: Avg. WAUs
glossary.description: Average number of unique weekly active users (WAU) for the selected period

glossary.name: Avg. MAUs
glossary.description: Average number of unique monthly active users (MAU) for your selected timeframe

glossary.name: Limit Ad Tracking Installs
glossary.description: Total number of installs originating from devices with Limit Ad Tracking enabled (LAT)

glossary.name: Limit Ad Tracking Reattributions
glossary.description: The total number of reattributions coming from devices with Limit Ad Tracking enabled (LAT)

glossary.name: GDPR Forgets
glossary.description: Number of GDPR forgets from users who installed the app in a selected date range and had the app installed for a selected cohort time period

glossary.name: Installs per Mille (IPM)
glossary.description: Installs per one thousand impressions

glossary.name: Click Conversion Rate (CCR)
glossary.description: How many clicks it takes on average for a user to install your app

glossary.name: Impression Conversion Rate (ICR)
glossary.description: How many impressions, on average, it takes a user to install your app

glossary.name: Limit Ad Tracking Rate
glossary.description: Percentage of installs that come from devices with Limit Ad Tracking enabled (LAT)

glossary.name: Limit Ad Tracking Reattribution Rate
glossary.description: Percentage of reattributions coming from devices with Limit Ad Tracking enabled (LAT)

glossary.name: Ad Revenue
glossary.description: Revenue generated by the serving of in-app ads

glossary.name: Ad Impressions
glossary.description: Number of ads served to app users

glossary.name: Ad RPM
glossary.description: Advertising revenue per thousand ad impressions

glossary.name: Rejected Installs
glossary.description: Number of installs that Adjust identified as fraudulent and rejected

glossary.name: Rejected Installs Anonymous IP
glossary.description: Number of installs that Adjust rejected because they came from anonymous IPs

glossary.name: Rejected Installs Too Many Engagements
glossary.description: Number of installs that Adjust rejected because too many engagements were registered within the attribution window

glossary.name: Rejected Installs Distribution Outlier
glossary.description: Number of installs that Adjust rejected because they were outside the threshold set by our distribution modeling analysis

glossary.name: Rejected Installs Click Injection
glossary.description: Number of installs Adjust rejected because of fake clicks between download and installation

glossary.name: Rejected Installs SDK Signature
glossary.description: The total number of installs we rejected for containing an invalid or missing SDK Signature

glossary.name: Rejected Reattribution
glossary.description: The total number of reattributions that Adjust identified as fraudulent and rejected

glossary.name: Rejected Reattributions Anonymous IP
glossary.description: Number of reattributions that were rejected because they were made by users with anonymous IPs

glossary.name: Rejected Reattributions Too Many Engagements
glossary.description: Number of reattributions rejected because too many engagements were registered within the reattribution window

glossary.name: Rejected Reattributions Distribution Outlier
glossary.description: Number of rejected reattributions that fall outside the threshold set by our distribution modeling analysis

glossary.name: Rejected Install Rate
glossary.description: Percentage of the total number of installs that Adjust identified as fraudulent and rejected

glossary.name: Rejected Installs Anonymous IP Rate
glossary.description: Percentage of the total number of installs that Adjust rejected because they were performed by an anonymous IP
glossary.formula: Rejected installs anon ip / (Installs + Rejected installs)

glossary.name: Rejected Installs Too Many Engagements Rate
glossary.description: Percentage of the total number of installs that Adjust rejected because they registered too many engagements within attribution window
glossary.formula: Rejected installs too many engagements / (Installs + Rejected installs)

glossary.name: Rejected Installs Distribution Outlier Rate
glossary.description: Percentage of the total number of installs that Adjust rejected because they fell outside the threshold set by our distribution modeling analysis
glossary.formula: Rejected installs distribution outlier / (Installs + Rejected installs)

glossary.name: Rejected Installs Click Injection Rate
glossary.description: Percentage of the total number of installs that Adjust rejected because of fake clicks between the download and instal
glossary.formula: Rejected installs click injection / (Installs + Rejected installs)

glossary.name: Rejected Reattribution Rate
glossary.description: Percentage of the total number of your reattributions that Adjust identified as fraudulent and rejected

glossary.name: Rejected Reattributions Anonymous IP Rate
glossary.description: Percentage of your total number of reattributions that were rejected by Adjust because they were from an anonymous IPs
glossary.formula: Rejected reattributions anon ip / (Reattributions + Rejected reattributions)

glossary.name: Rejected Reattributions Too Many Engagements Rate
glossary.description: Percentage of the total number of reattributions that Adjust rejected because too many engagements within the attribution window
glossary.formula: Rejected reattributions too many engagements / (Reattributions + Rejected reattributions)

glossary.name: Rejected Reattributions Distribution Outlier Rate
glossary.description: Percentage of your total number of reattributions that Adjust rejected because they fell outside the threshold set by our distribution modeling analysis
glossary.formula: Rejected reattributions distribution outlier / (Reattributions + Rejected reattributions)

glossary.name: Rejected Reattributions Click Injection
glossary.description: The total number of reattributions that were rejected because of false clicks between an app download and an app installation for a user who had previously installed your app and to whom that install attributed within Adjust

glossary.name: Rejected Reattributions Click Injection Rate
glossary.description: The percentage of the total number of reattributions rejected by that Adjust for fake clicks sent between an app download and an app installation for a user who had previously installed your app and to whom that install attributed within Adjust
glossary.formula: Rejected reattributions click injection / (Reattributions + Rejected reattributions)

glossary.name: Rejected Installs Malformed Advertising ID
glossary.description: The total number of installs that Adjust rejected because they had a malformed advertising ID.

glossary.name: Rejected Install Malformed Advertising ID Rate
glossary.description: The percentage of your total number of installs that Adjust rejected because of the malformed advertising ID.
glossary.formula: Rejected installs malformed advertising id / (Installs + Rejected installs)

glossary.name: Install Cost
glossary.description: The cost of installs

glossary.name: Ad Spend (Attribution)
glossary.description: Amount of money spent on ads. Calculated using only data obtained using Adjust's cost-on-engagement method
glossary.formula: ((Install cost + Click cost) + Impression cost) + Event cost

glossary.name: Ad Spend
glossary.description: Amount of money spent on ads

glossary.name: Effective Cost per Click (eCPC)
glossary.description: Effective cost per click

glossary.name: eCPM (Attribution)
glossary.description: Effective cost per thousand ad impressions calculated using the attribution ad spend source

glossary.name: eCPI (Paid Installs)
glossary.description: Effective cost per paid install

glossary.name: eCPI (All Installs)
glossary.description: Effective cost per install

glossary.name: Gross profit (Cohort)
glossary.description: Cohorted gross profit

glossary.name: Gross profit
glossary.description: Revenue minus ad spend

glossary.name: Return On Investment (ROI)
glossary.description: Cohort gross profit divided by advertising spend

glossary.name: Revenue To Cost Ratio (RCR)
glossary.description: The ratio of revenue to cost

glossary.name: ROAS
glossary.description: Return on advertising spend, calculated based on all revenue sources for a given cohort period

glossary.name: ROAS (Ad Revenue)
glossary.description: Return on advertising spend, calculated using only revenue from serving ads, for a given cohort period

glossary.name: ROAS (IAP Revenue)
glossary.description: Return on advertising spend, calculated using only in-app revenue, for a selected cohort period

glossary.name: ARPDAU (All)
glossary.description: Average revenue per daily active user, calculated based on all revenue sources

glossary.name: ARPDAU (Ad)
glossary.description: Average revenue per daily active user calculated using only revenue from serving ads

glossary.name: ARPDAU (IAP)
glossary.description: Average in-app purchase revenue per daily active user

glossary.name: All Revenue
glossary.description: Amount of revenue generated by an app, calculated based on all revenue sources

glossary.name: All Revenue (Cohort)
glossary.description: Sum of your cohorted in-app revenue and advertising revenue

glossary.name: Ad Revenue (Cohort)
glossary.description: Amount of advertising revenue calculated per period

glossary.name: First Reinstalls
glossary.description: Number of first-time reinstalls per time period

glossary.name: First Uninstalls
glossary.description: Number of first time uninstalls per time period

glossary.name: Invalid Signature Rejected Install Rate
glossary.description: The percentage of your total number of installs that Adjust rejected for containing an invalid or missing SDK Signature
glossary.formula: Rejected installs invalid signature / (Installs + Rejected installs)

glossary.name: Organic Installs
glossary.description: Installs attributed to an organic source

glossary.name: Non-Organic Installs
glossary.description: Installs that are not attributed to an organic source

glossary.name: Subscriptions
glossary.description: The number of new subscriptions

glossary.name: Subscription Revenue
glossary.description: The sum of revenue from subscriptions

glossary.name: Offers
glossary.description: The number of new offers

glossary.name: Ad Spend (Network)
glossary.description: Ad spend data retrieved via the network API

glossary.name: Installs (Network)
glossary.description: Number of installs reported by the Network API

glossary.name: Impressions (Network)
glossary.description: Number of impressions reported by the network API

glossary.name: Clicks (Network)
glossary.description: Number of clicks reported by the network API

glossary.name: CTR (Network)
glossary.description: The average number of impressions per click reported by the network API

glossary.name: Ad Spend Diff (Network)
glossary.description: Difference between the Attribution and Network data sources

glossary.name: Installs Diff (Network)
glossary.description: Difference between installs reported by the network API and Adjust

glossary.name: eCPI (Network)
glossary.description: Effective cost per install reported by the network API

glossary.name: eCPM (Network)
glossary.description: Effective cost per thousand ad impressions reported by the network API

glossary.name: eCPC (Network)
glossary.description: Effective cost per click reported by the network API

glossary.name: Ad spend (SKAN)
glossary.description: The amount spent on ads for SKAdNetwork campaigns as reported by the network API.

glossary.name: Impressions (Network SKAN)
glossary.description: The number of impressions coming from SKAN shared by a partner API

glossary.name: Installs (Network SKAN)
glossary.description: The number of SKAN installs coming from SKAN shared by a partner API

glossary.name: Impressions (Network non-SKAN)
glossary.description: The number of impressions coming from the ATT framework shared by a partner API

glossary.name: Installs (Network non-SKAN)
glossary.description: The number of ATT installs coming from the ATT framework shared by a partner API

glossary.name: Impressions (Network unknown source)
glossary.description: The number of impressions shared by a partner API where the framework is unknown (ATT or SKAN)

glossary.name: Installs (Network unknown source)
glossary.description: The number of installs shared by a partner API where the framework is unknown (ATT or SKAN)

glossary.name: eCPI (SKAN)
glossary.description: Effective cost per install, calculated by dividing the amount spent on ads for SKAdNetwork campaigns by installs.
glossary.formula: Network ad spend skan / Network installs skan

glossary.name: Ad Spend (Network)
glossary.description: Ad spend data retrieved via the network API

glossary.name: Assisting Clicks
glossary.description: All of the user clicks that were considered, but not awarded the attribution.

glossary.name: Assisting Impressions
glossary.description: All of the user impressions that were considered, but not awarded the attribution.

glossary.name: Assisting Engagements
glossary.description: All of the user touchpoints that were considered, but not awarded the attribution. These can be clicks or impressions, but must fall within the link's attribution window.

glossary.name: Assisted Installs
glossary.description: The number of app installs that qualified for attribution but were not selected.

glossary.name: Assisting Clicks for Reattributions
glossary.description: All of the user clicks that were considered but not awarded the reattribution

glossary.name: Assisting Engagements for Reattributions
glossary.description: All of the user touchpoints that were considered but not awarded the reattribution. These can be clicks or impressions, but must fall within the link's reattribution window.

glossary.name: Average Engagements per Assisted Install
glossary.description: The average number of engagements that assisted an install.

glossary.name: Average Impressions per Assisted Install
glossary.description: The average number of impressions that assisted an installs.

glossary.name: Average Clicks per Assisted Install
glossary.description: The average number of clicks that assisted an install.

glossary.name: Non-Assisted Installs
glossary.description: The number of app installs that had no qualifying touchpoints within the attribution window prior to the attributed engagement. Organic users do not have any engagement with an Adjust link, therefore are not considered as assisting an install.

glossary.name: Conversion Value
glossary.description: Number of valid SKAdNetwork postbacks with the corresponding conversion value

glossary.name: Conversion Bit
glossary.description: Number of valid SKAdNetwork postbacks where the corresponding conversion event has been triggered

glossary.name: Conversion Bit 1 (SKAdNetwork)
glossary.description: Number of valid SKAdNetwork postbacks where the corresponding conversion event has been triggered

glossary.name: Conversion Bit 2 (SKAdNetwork)
glossary.description: Number of valid SKAdNetwork postbacks where the corresponding conversion event has been triggered

glossary.name: Conversion Bit 3 (SKAdNetwork)
glossary.description: Number of valid SKAdNetwork postbacks where the corresponding conversion event has been triggered

glossary.name: Conversion Bit 4 (SKAdNetwork)
glossary.description: Number of valid SKAdNetwork postbacks where the corresponding conversion event has been triggered

glossary.name: Conversion Bit 5 (SKAdNetwork)
glossary.description: Number of valid SKAdNetwork postbacks where the corresponding conversion event has been triggered

glossary.name: Conversion Bit 6 (SKAdNetwork)
glossary.description: Number of valid SKAdNetwork postbacks where the corresponding conversion event has been triggered

glossary.name: Total installs (SKAd)
glossary.description: The number of installs and reinstalls reported by SKAN

glossary.name: Installs (SKAN)
glossary.description: The number of postbacks received representing a new install. I.e. where 'redownload' was set to false.

glossary.name: Reinstalls (SKAN)
glossary.description: The number of postbacks received representing a reinstall. I.e. where 'redownload' was set to true.

glossary.name: Qualifiers (SKAdNetwork)
glossary.description: The number of installs that had a touchpoint with the network, but did not win the final SKAN attribution. This means the SKAN postback returned a "did-win: false" flag.

glossary.name: Invalid Payloads (SKAdNetwork)
glossary.description: A counter of SKAN postbacks (install/reinstall) that are invalid due to the verification via the attribution signature

glossary.name: Conversion value null
glossary.description: The number of SKAN 3 postbacks and SKAN 4 1st postbacks received with a nulled conversion value. Null means an install took place, but further data has been hidden due to Apple's privacy framework.

glossary.name: Conversion value null rate
glossary.description: The number of postbacks received with a conversion value of null divided by the total number of SKAN installs.
glossary.formula: Skad conversion value null / Skad installs

glossary.name: Conversion value greater than 0
glossary.description: The number of postbacks received with a conversion value greater than 0.

glossary.name: Valid conversions
glossary.description: A counter of SKAN postbacks (installs/reinstalls) that have a valid conversion value (0-63)

glossary.name: Conversion Value Total (SKAdNetwork)
glossary.description: Sum of all conversion values as a single integer. The count of each conversion value is multiplied by its conversion value. For example: for conversion value 40 the total number of recorded occurrences is multiplied by 40 to give the resulting total conversion value

glossary.name: Conversion Value 0 (SKAdNetwork)
glossary.description: Number of valid SKAdNetwork postbacks with the corresponding conversion value

glossary.name: Total Revenue (Min)

glossary.name: ROAS (SKAN minimum)
glossary.description: The return on ad spend, calculated by dividing the minimum total revenue from your conversion values by the amount spent on ads for SKAN campaigns
glossary.formula: (General revenue revenue min * Skad installs) / (Network ad spend skan * Valid conversions)

glossary.name: ROAS (SKAN maximum)
glossary.description: The return on ad spend, calculated by dividing the maximum total revenue from your conversion values by the amount spent on ads for SKAN campaigns
glossary.formula: (General revenue revenue max * Skad installs) / (Network ad spend skan * Valid conversions)

glossary.name: ROAS (SKAN average)
glossary.description: The return on ad spend, calculated by dividing the average total revenue from your conversion values by the amount spent on ads for SKAN campaigns
glossary.formula: (General revenue revenue est * Skad installs) / (Network ad spend skan * Valid conversions)

glossary.name: ROI (SKAN minimum)
glossary.description: The return on investment, calculated by dividing the minimum total gross revenue from your conversion values by the amount spent on ads for SKAN campaigns
glossary.formula: ((General revenue revenue min * Skad installs) / (Network ad spend skan * Valid conversions)) - 1

glossary.name: ROI (SKAN maximum)
glossary.description: The return on investment, calculated by dividing the maximum total gross revenue from your conversion values by the amount spent on ads for SKAN campaigns
glossary.formula: ((General revenue revenue max * Skad installs) / (Network ad spend skan * Valid conversions)) - 1

glossary.name: ROI (SKAN average)
glossary.description: The return on investment, calculated by dividing the average total gross revenue from your conversion values by the amount spent on ads for SKAN campaigns
glossary.formula: ((General revenue revenue est * Skad installs) / (Network ad spend skan * Valid conversions)) - 1

glossary.name: Ad revenue (SKAN maximum)

glossary.name: Ad revenue (SKAN average)
glossary.description: The average ad revenue generated according to the range of the triggered conversion value.

glossary.name: Ad revenue (SKAN minimum)
glossary.description: The minimum ad revenue generated according to the range of the triggered conversion value.

glossary.description: Number of users who installed the app in the time period you selected and have had your app for at least N days, weeks, or months

glossary.name: {cohort_period} Reattributions
glossary.description: Number of users who installed the app in your chosen timeframe and were reattributed during a given cohort period

glossary.name: {cohort_period} Reattributions Per User
glossary.description: Number of reattributions per user of deattributions for the selected cohort period

glossary.name: {cohort_period} Deattributions
glossary.description: Number of users who installed the app during the time period you selected and were deattributed during a given cohort period

glossary.name: {cohort_period} Deattributions Per User
glossary.description: Number of deattributions per user for the selected cohort period

glossary.name: {cohort_period} Reattributions per Deattribution
glossary.description: Number of reattributions divided by the number of deattributions for the selected cohort period

glossary.name: {cohort_period} Sessions
glossary.description: Number of sessions by users who installed the app in a selected date range and had the app installed during a selected cohort period

glossary.name: {cohort_period} Non-Install Sessions
glossary.description: Total number of non-install sessions by users who installed the app in a selected date range and have had the app installed for a selected cohort period

glossary.name: {cohort_period} Uninstalls
glossary.description: Number of users who installed the app in a selected date range and also uninstalled the app during a selected cohort period

glossary.name: {cohort_period} Uninstalls Total
glossary.description: Cumulative number of users who installed the app in your selected time period and also uninstalled it during a selected cohort period"

glossary.name: {cohort_period} First Uninstalls
glossary.description: Number of first-time uninstalls by users who installed the app in a selected date range and had the app installed during a selected cohort period

glossary.name: {cohort_period} First Uninstalls Total
glossary.description: Cumulative number of first-time uninstalls by users who installed the app in a selected date range and had the app installed for a selected cohort period

glossary.name: {cohort_period} Reinstalls
glossary.description: Number of users who installed the app in your selected date range and also reinstalled the app during a selected cohort period

glossary.name: {cohort_period} Reinstalls Total
glossary.description: Cumulative number of users who installed the app in your selected time period and reinstalled it during a selected cohort period

glossary.name: {cohort_period} First Reinstalls
glossary.description: Number of first-time reinstalls by users who installed the app in a selected date range and had the app installed for a selected cohort period

glossary.name: {cohort_period} First Reinstalls Total
glossary.description: Cumulative number of first-time reinstalls by users who installed the app in a selected date range and had the app installed for a selected cohort period

glossary.name: {cohort_period} GDPR Forgets
glossary.description: Number of GDPR forgets from users who installed the app in a selected date range and had the app installed for a selected cohort time period

glossary.name: {cohort_period} GDPR Forget Users Total
glossary.description: Cumulative number of GDPR forgets from users who installed the app in a selected date range and had the app installed for a selected cohort time period

glossary.name: {cohort_period} Revenue
glossary.description: In-app revenue from users who installed the app in a selected date range and had the app installed during a selected cohort period

glossary.name: {cohort_period} Revenue Total
glossary.description: Cumulative amount of in-app revenue from users who installed the app in a selected date range and had the app installed for a selected cohort period

glossary.name: {cohort_period} Revenue Total In Cohort
glossary.description: The cumulative in-app revenue generated during the selected cohort period. Only users who have completed the entire cohort period after install are included in the calculation.

glossary.name: {cohort_period} Time Spent
glossary.description: Number of seconds spent in the app by users who installed the app in a selected date range and had the app installed for a selected cohort period

glossary.name: {cohort_period} Paying Users
glossary.description: The total number of users who completed an in-app purchase on the Nth day/week/month after install or reinstall

glossary.name: {cohort_period} Paying User Size
glossary.description: The total number of users who installed your app during the time period you selected, who had your app installed for the duration of a given cohort period, and who completed an in-app purchase at any time

glossary.name: {cohort_period} Revenue events
glossary.description: Number of revenue events triggered by users who installed the app in a selected date range and had the app installed for a selected cohort period

glossary.name: {cohort_period} Revenue Events Total In Cohort
glossary.description: The cumulative number of revenue events generated during the selected cohort period. Only users who have completed the entire cohort period after install are included in the calculation.

glossary.name: {cohort_period} Retention
glossary.description: Number of retained users divided by a cohort size
glossary.formula: Retained users {cohort period} / Cohort size {cohort period}

glossary.name: {cohort_period} Sessions per users
glossary.description: Average number of sessions per user during the selected cohort period

glossary.name: {cohort_period} In-app Revenue per user
glossary.description: Average in-app revenue per user for a selected cohort_period

glossary.name: {cohort_period} Revenue Total Per User
glossary.description: Cumulative in-app revenue per user for a selected cohort period
glossary.formula: Revenue total {cohort period} / Cohort size {cohort period}

glossary.name: {cohort_period} All Revenue per paying user
glossary.description: Average in-app revenue per paying user for a selected cohort period

glossary.name: {cohort_period} Lifetime Value all users (LTV)
glossary.description: Lifetime value of a user calculated using all revenue sources for a given cohort period
glossary.formula: All revenue total in cohort {cohort period} / Cohort size {cohort period}

glossary.name: {cohort_period} LTV (Ad) All Users
glossary.description: Lifetime value of a user for a given cohort period, calculated using only revenue from serving ads
glossary.formula: Ad revenue total in cohort {cohort period} / Cohort size {cohort period}

glossary.name: {cohort_period} LTV (IAP) All Users
glossary.description: Lifetime value of a user, calculated using only in-app revenue, for a selected cohort period
glossary.formula: Revenue total in cohort {cohort period} / Cohort size {cohort period}

glossary.name: {cohort_period} Lifetime Value paying users
glossary.description: Lifetime value of a paying user, calculated using all revenue sources, for a selected cohort period
glossary.formula: All revenue total in cohort {cohort period} / Paying user size {cohort period}

glossary.name: {cohort_period} LTV (Ad) Paying Users
glossary.description: Lifetime value of a paying user for a selected cohort period, calculated using only revenue from serving ads
glossary.formula: Ad revenue total in cohort {cohort period} / Paying user size {cohort period}

glossary.name: {cohort_period} LTV (IAP) Paying Users
glossary.description: Lifetime value for paying users, calculated using in-app revenue only, for a selected cohort period
glossary.formula: Revenue total in cohort {cohort period} / Paying user size {cohort period}

glossary.name: {cohort_period} Time spent per user
glossary.description: Average number of seconds each user in a cohort spent in the app during the selected cohort period
glossary.formula: Time spent {cohort period} // Cohort size {cohort period}

glossary.name: {cohort_period} Time Spent Per Active User
glossary.description: Average number of seconds spent in the app by each active user in a cohort during the selected cohort period
glossary.formula: Time spent {cohort period} // Retained users {cohort period}

glossary.name: {cohort_period} Time spent per session
glossary.description: Average number of seconds each session lasted during the selected cohort period
glossary.formula: Time spent {cohort period} // Non install sessions {cohort period}

glossary.name: {cohort_period} Retention paying users
glossary.description: Number of retained paying users divided by a number ofretained users
glossary.formula: Paying users {cohort period} / Retained users {cohort period}

glossary.name: {cohort_period} Paying user rate
glossary.description: Proportion of paying users in a cohort for a given cohort period
glossary.formula: Paying users {cohort period} / Cohort size {cohort period}

glossary.name: {cohort_period} Revenue events per user
glossary.description: Number of revenue events divided by a cohort size for a selected cohort period
glossary.formula: Revenue events {cohort period} / Cohort size {cohort period}

glossary.name: {cohort_period} Revenue Events Per Active User
glossary.description: Number of revenue events divided by the number of retained users for a selected cohort period
glossary.formula: Revenue events {cohort period} / Retained users {cohort period}

glossary.name: {cohort_period} Revenue Events Per Paying User
glossary.description: Number of revenue events divided by the number of paying users for a selected cohort period
glossary.formula: Revenue events {cohort period} / Paying users {cohort period}

glossary.name: {cohort_period} ROAS
glossary.description: Return on advertising spend, calculated based on all revenue sources for a given cohort period

glossary.name: {cohort_period} ROAS (Ad Revenue)
glossary.description: Return on advertising spend, calculated using only revenue from serving ads, for a given cohort period

glossary.name: {cohort_period} ROAS (IAP Revenue)
glossary.description: Return on advertising spend, calculated using only in-app revenue, for a selected cohort period

glossary.name: {cohort_period} Ad Revenue
glossary.description: Ad revenue from users who installed the app in a selected date range and had the app installed during a selected cohort period

glossary.name: {cohort_period} Ad Impressions
glossary.description: Number of ads served to users who installed the app in a selected date range and had the app installed for a selected cohort period

glossary.name: {cohort_period} Ad Impressions Total
glossary.description: Cumulative number of ads served to users who installed the app in a selected date range and had the app installed for a selected cohort period

glossary.name: {cohort_period} Ad RPM
glossary.description: Advertising revenue per thousand ad impressions

glossary.name: {cohort_period} Ad Revenue Total
glossary.description: The cumulative revenue generated by serving in-app ads to users who installed the app in a selected date range and remained active during a selected cohort period

glossary.name: {cohort_period} Ad Revenue Total In Cohort
glossary.description: The cumulative ad revenue generated during the selected cohort period. Only users who have completed the entire cohort period after install are included in the calculation.

glossary.name: {cohort_period} Ad Revenue Total Per User
glossary.description: Cumulative ad revenue per user for a selected cohort period
glossary.formula: Ad revenue total {cohort period} / Cohort size {cohort period}

glossary.name: {cohort_period} All Revenue
glossary.description: Amount of revenue generated by an app, calculated based on all revenue sources

glossary.name: {cohort_period} All Revenue Total
glossary.description: Cumulative revenue from all revenue sources for a selected cohort period
glossary.formula: Ad revenue total {cohort period} + Revenue total {cohort period}

glossary.name: {cohort_period} All Revenue Per User
glossary.description: Revenue per user calculated based on all revenue sources for a selected cohort period
glossary.formula: All revenue {cohort period} / Cohort size {cohort period}

glossary.name: {cohort_period} All Revenue Total Per User
glossary.description: Cumulative revenue from all revenue sources per user for a selected cohort period
glossary.formula: All revenue total {cohort period} / Cohort size {cohort period}

glossary.name: {cohort_period} All Revenue Total In Cohort
glossary.formula: Ad revenue total in cohort {cohort period} + Revenue total in cohort {cohort period}

glossary.name: {cohort_period} First-Time Paying Users
glossary.description: Number of users making their initial purchase until a specific cohort period

glossary.name: {cohort_period} Total Paying Users
glossary.description: Cumulative count of users who've made at least one purchase within the cohort period

glossary.name: {cohort_period} Paying Users Conversion Rate
glossary.description: Percentage of the cohort's users who became buyers on a specific day
glossary.formula: First paying users {cohort period} / Cohort size {cohort period}

glossary.name: {cohort_period} First-Time Paying Users Conversion Rate
glossary.description: Ratio of first-time purchasers to the number of retained users for a given day post-install
glossary.formula: First paying users {cohort period} / Retained users {cohort period}

glossary.name: {cohort_period} Cost per Paying User
glossary.description: Average ad spend per paying user during the cohort period
glossary.formula: Cost / First paying users total {cohort period}

glossary.name: {cohort_period} {event_slug} (Events)
glossary.description: Number of events triggered

glossary.name: {cohort_period} {event_slug} (Revenue)
glossary.description: Amount of in-app revenue, based on revenue events reported by the Adjust SDK or recorded via server-to-server tracking

glossary.name: {cohort_period} {event_slug} (Events per Period)
glossary.description: The number of times an event was triggered during the cohort period

glossary.name: {cohort_period} {event_slug} (Event Revenue per Period)
glossary.description: The revenue for the event during the cohort period

glossary.name: {cohort_period} {event_slug} (Conversions)
glossary.description: Number of returning users who completed the relevant in-app event on day, week or month N after install

glossary.name: {cohort_period} {event_slug} (Converted User Size)
glossary.description: Number of users who completed the relevant in-app event by day, week or month N and installed your app at least N days, weeks or months ago

glossary.name: {cohort_period} {event_slug} (Conversion Distribution)
glossary.formula: {event slug} {cohort period} conversions cohort / {event slug} {cohort period} converted user size cohort

glossary.name: {cohort_period} Cost per {event_slug} (Events)
glossary.description: Ad spend divided by the number of triggered events

glossary.name: {cohort_period} Cost per {event_slug} (Conversions)
glossary.description: Ad spend divided by the number of conversions

glossary.name: {cohort_period} {event_slug} Rate (Events)
glossary.description: Number of triggered events divided by the number of installs

glossary.name: {cohort_period} {event_slug} Rate (Conversions)
glossary.description: Number of conversions divided by the number of installs

glossary.name: {cohort_period} {event_slug} Events per Conversion
glossary.description: Number of triggered events per divided by the number of conversions
glossary.formula: {event slug} {cohort period} events cohort / {event slug} {cohort period} conversions cohort

glossary.name: {cohort_period} {event_slug} per Reattribution
glossary.description: Number of triggered events divided by the number of reattributions for the selected cohort period

glossary.name: {cohort_period} {event_slug} Conversions per Reattributions
glossary.description: Number of conversions divided by the number of reattributions for the selected cohort period

glossary.name: {cohort_period} {event_slug} Revenue per Conversion
glossary.description: Revenue generated by the chosen event divided by the number of conversions
glossary.formula: {event slug} {cohort period} revenue cohort / {event slug} {cohort period} conversions cohort

glossary.name: {event_slug}
glossary.description: Number of events triggered

glossary.name: {event_slug} (In-app revenue)
glossary.description: Amount of in-app revenue, based on revenue events reported by the Adjust SDK or recorded via server-to-server tracking

glossary.name: {event_slug} (Min)
glossary.description: Number of events unpacked from Conversion Value revenue buckets, that contain the specified named event

glossary.name: {event_slug} (Max)
glossary.description: Number of events unpacked from Conversion Value revenue buckets, that contain the specified named event

glossary.name: {event_slug} (Average)
glossary.description: Number of events unpacked from Conversion Value revenue buckets, that contain the specified named event

glossary.name: {event_slug} (Min Revenue)
glossary.description: Revenue unpacked from Conversion Value revenue buckets, that contain the specified named event

glossary.name: {event_slug} (Max Revenue)
glossary.description: Revenue unpacked from Conversion Value revenue buckets, that contain the specified named event

glossary.name: {event_slug} (Average Revenue)
glossary.description: Revenue unpacked from Conversion Value revenue buckets, that contain the specified named event

glossary.name: {event_slug} (Conversion rate)
glossary.description: The number of unpacked events divided by the number of valid conversions
glossary.formula: {event slug} events est / Skad total installs

glossary.name: {event_slug} (eCPA (SKAN))
glossary.formula: (Network ad spend skan * Valid conversions) / ({event slug} events est * Skad installs)

glossary.name: {event_slug} (Not Verified Events)
glossary.description: Revenue events that have not been verified

glossary.name: {event_slug} (Not Verified Revenue)
glossary.description: Revenue from events that have not been verified

glossary.name: {event_slug} (Verified Passed Events)
glossary.description: Revenue events that have been verified and confirmed as valid

glossary.name: {event_slug} (Verified Passed Revenue)
glossary.description: Revenue from events that have been verified and confirmed as valid

glossary.name: {event_slug} (Verified Failed Events)
glossary.description: Revenue events that have been verified and confirmed as invalid

glossary.name: {event_slug} (Verfied Failed Revenue)
glossary.description: Revenue from events that have been verified and confirmed as invalid

glossary.name: {event_slug} (Verified Unknown Events)
glossary.description: Revenue events that have been verified but returned an unknown status

glossary.name: {event_slug} (Verified Unknown Revenue)
glossary.description: Revenue from events that have been verified but returned an unknown status
